Borghal

Christmas traditions
Every Christmas Eve for several years now we watch Cleopatra. I don't know why, it's just what we do. And every year I take a picture of this scene, when we first see Elizabeth Taylor as Cleopatra, freshly rolled out of the carpet.Do you have unusual Christmas traditions?#ElizabethTaylor #Cleopatra #ChristmasTraditions

Christmas traditions

Every Christmas Eve for several years now we watch Cleopatra. I don't know why, it's just what we do. And every year I take a picture of this scene, when we first see Elizabeth Taylor as Cleopatra, freshly rolled out of the carpet.

Do you have unusual Christmas traditions?

#ElizabethTaylor #Cleopatra #ChristmasTraditions
